title: In 1959, what Bertrand Russell said to the furture people
snippet: I should like to say two things, one intellectual and one moral:      The intellectual thing I should want to say to them is this: When you are studying any matter or considering any philosophy, ask yourself only what are the facts and what is the truth that the facts bear out. Never let yourself...
